nodes.text: Celto was a small leafy green that could be included with various meals to enhance flavor. The chef Gormaanda provided instructional holovids including tips on how to properly use this food additive for various meals. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the Wookiee Mallatobuck used liberal helpings of this item when preparing a special Life Day Bantha Surprise  dinner for her husband, Chewbacca.
